lawName: Prohibition of new building construction in high and very high fire hazard zones
Minimum protection strip distance from forested, bushland or natural pasture areas
Minimum protection strip distance from agricultural spaces (moderate fire hazard)
Minimum protection strip distance from agricultural spaces (low fire hazard)
Minimum protection strip distance from agricultural spaces (very low fire hazard)
Protection strip measured from exterior masonry
Adoption of fire ignition containment measures
Requirement of favorable opinion from CMDF
Accountability of existing road infrastructure or water bodies in protection strip distance
